sentences.en: All the old crowd have come out for this occasion.
sentences.cn: 那些老伙计们都来参加这一庆典。

sentences.en: But he could also turn on the style when the occasion demanded.
sentences.cn: 但是如果场合需要，他也能拿出派头来。

sentences.en: He could also turn on the style when the occasion demanded.
sentences.cn: 如果场合需要，他也能瞬间就表现得风度翩翩。

sentences.en: He treated them seriously and, on occasion, entertained them hilariously.
sentences.cn: 他对待他们严肃认真，偶尔又逗得他们捧腹不已。

sentences.en: His remark was the occasion of a bitter quarrel.
sentences.cn: 他的话引起了一场激烈的争吵。

sentences.en: How can anyone look sad at an occasion like this?
sentences.cn: 在这样的场合怎么会有人显得忧伤呢？

sentences.en: I had occasion to call on him last year.
sentences.cn: 去年我因事去拜访过他。

sentences.en: I often think fondly of an occasion some years ago in New Orleans.
sentences.cn: 我经常深情地想起一些年前在新奥尔良所发生的一幕。

sentences.en: I’m saving this bottle of champagne for a special occasion.
sentences.cn: 我要把这瓶香槟酒留到特别的日子喝。

sentences.en: It is, however, necessary on occasion to work outwith these hours.
sentences.cn: 然而，有时候在这些时点之外也需要工作。

sentences.en: It will be a unique family occasion.
sentences.cn: 这将是一次特别的家庭聚会。

sentences.en: Nobody is perfect, and everyone acts thoughtlessly on occasion.
sentences.cn: 人无完人，谁都难保不偶尔疏忽一次。

sentences.en: On another occasion I answered the phone and the line went dead.
sentences.cn: 还有一回，我一接电话，就掉线了。

sentences.en: on occasion, the state was asked to intervene.
sentences.cn: 有时政府会被要求进行干预。

sentences.en: She had met Zahid on two separate occasions.
sentences.cn: 她遇到过扎希德两次。

sentences.en: The colourful flags added to the gaiety of the occasion.
sentences.cn: 彩旗增添了盛会的欢乐气氛。

sentences.en: The coronation was an occasion for extravagant myth and sentiment.
sentences.cn: 加冕典礼是极尽奢华和怀旧的仪式。

sentences.en: The meal gave the occasion an almost festive air.
sentences.cn: 这一餐使整个场合有了近乎节日般的喜庆氛围。

sentences.en: The new moon was the occasion of festivals of rejoicing in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 在埃及，新月之时是欢庆之日。

sentences.en: The wedding was an occasion of great festivity.
sentences.cn: 这个婚礼是喜庆盛事。

sentences.en: There was no occasion for ranting.
sentences.cn: 没必要大声咆哮.

sentences.en: This was the occasion for expressions of friendship by the two presidents.
sentences.cn: 这是两位总统进行友好交流的时机。
